page.title: 09SHOOTING SCHOOL NEAR ANDOVER
page.content: Set in the heart of one of the main game-shooting counties in the country, business is brisk at the {Apsley Shooting Ground. From their base, at the bottom of a deep disused railway cutting, a team of five keeps the school open for{six {days a week all the year round}to meet the growing demand for{Game Shooting tuition. And all types of pupil are catered for: from the youngster given a set of lessons as a birthday present, to the experienced sportsman wishing to "get his eye in" before the season begins; from the busy company executive relaxing from the pressures of work, to the old local for whom shooting is as much part of life as the passing seasons. But, whoever you are, you will have one thing in common with the rest for, a growing sport it may be, but it is certainly not cheap.
